DataElement.preferredName: Definitive Surgical Procedure Performed Year Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value that represents the year definitive surgical procedure was performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Supplying or being a final or conclusive settlement or result._A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery._Performed; carried out.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Supplying or being a final or conclusive settlement or result.:A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Concepts.definition: Supplying or being a final or conclusive settlement or result.

A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Curated for The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) by request of T. Lichtenberg 12/2010 sw

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Event; something that happens at a given place and time._The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days._Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Event; something that happens at a given place and time.:The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: Something that happens at a given place and time.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated for The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) by request of T. Lichtenberg 12/2010 sw Modified definition to move system-generated definition to alternate definition and replace primary definition with human readable format approved by TCGA/Tara. mc 6/22/11
